SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
This class is the controller of a single game. It is a Controller relative to Model-View-Controller design pattern. The idea of this class is to implement an Observer of the view, and to obtain from it events (user input), extract from the view necessary information, and call methods on the model (gameAssociated)

      This method sets a color for the given player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player
      color - the chosen color

    • choosePrivateGoal

      public void choosePrivateGoal(String nickname, int cardIdx)
      This method choose which private goal between the given two for the given player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player name
      cardIdx - an index, 0 or 1, representing which card is being chosen

    • placeInitialCard

      public void placeInitialCard(String nickname, CardOrientation cardOrientation)
      This method place the initial card for the given player, choosing if the card has to be placed upward or downward
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player name
      cardOrientation - the orientation of the card of type CardOrientation

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String nickname, String cardCode, String anchorCode, Direction direction, CardOrientation cardOrientation)
      This method place a card for the given player, using another card (anchor) and the place direction
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player name
      cardCode - the code of the card to place
      anchorCode - the code of the anchor card
      direction - the direction where to put the card, of type Direction
      cardOrientation - the CardOrientation chosen by player

    • drawCardFromDeck

      public void drawCardFromDeck(String nickname, PlayableCardType type)
      This method draws a card from deck for the given player, choosing between PlayableCardType decks (only PlayableCardType.GOLD and PlayableCardType.RESOURCE).
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player name
      type - the PlayableCardType chosen, only PlayableCardType.GOLD and PlayableCardType.RESOURCE are admissible types

    • drawCardFromTable

      public void drawCardFromTable(String nickname, PlayableCardType type, int position)
      This method draws a card from a table position for the given player, choosing between PlayableCardType decks (only PlayableCardType.GOLD and PlayableCardType.RESOURCE).
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player name
      type - the PlayableCardType chosen, only PlayableCardType.GOLD and PlayableCardType.RESOURCE are admissible types
      position - an integer between 0 and 1, representing the position of the chosen card

    • checkDrawConditions

      private boolean checkDrawConditions(String nickname)
      This method checks if the player with a given nickname can draw a card. This is possible if it is the player's turn and the player is in TurnState.DRAW turn state. Moreover, the game should be in the status of GameState.PLAYING.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to check if he can draw
      Returns:
      If all these conditions are met, this method returns false. If a condition is not met, this method returns true

    • setNextPlayer

      private void setNextPlayer() throws GameFinishedException
      This method sets the next player, checking if this player is connected to the game or not. If the player is not connected, the turn will go to the successive player
      Throws:
      GameFinishedException

    • calculateFinalResult

      private void calculateFinalResult()
      This method tells the game to update points using public and private goal cards

    • endGame

      private void endGame()

    • stopGame

      private void stopGame()
      This method is called when there is a timeout and at most only a client is connected

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(ArrayList<String> receivers, String senderNick, String message)
      This method is used to send a chat message to some players of the game.
      Parameters:
      receivers - an ArrayList<String> containing all names of players to which message must be sent.
      senderNick - the nickname of the player who sent the message
      message - the message to be sent
